meta_description: As Wisconsin's natural history museum, MPM inspires curiosity, excites minds, and increases desire to preserve our world's natural and cultural diversity.
hours_text:
## Hours

Get up-to-date information on MPM's hours of operation.  

[View](/plan-visit/hours)

## Admission

View ticket prices and our updated ticketing procedures.

[Tickets](/plan-visit/ticket-prices)

## Accessibility

The Milwaukee Public Museum strives to make its exhibits, programs, and facilities accessible to all visitors.

[Learn More](/plan-visit/accessibility)

Scroll down

## Getting Here

Get information on directions, parking, accommodations, and more.  

[More Info](/plan-visit/directions-parking)

## Events & Programs

See what's happening at MPM and when!  

[Learn More](/events-programs)

## Exhibitions

Learn about our world-class dioramas and permanent exhibits.

[Explore](/plan-visit/exhibitions)

## Group Visits

Looking for something beyond your traditional group outing? Let us help you create the perfect experience!  

[Learn More](/plan-visit/groups)

## Educators

Discover MPM's newest educational resource, the Curious Classroom.

[More Info](/educators/educator-guide)

## Theater & Planetarium

Take in an awe-inspiring Planetarium program, a thrilling 3D show, or a magnificent giant screen show.   

[What's On](/plan-visit/theater-planetarium)

## Plan Your Event

Throw the party of a lifetime at MPM! We offer a one-of-a-kind venue for weddings, dinners, holiday parties, and more.  

[Learn More](/plan-an-event)

## Policies

We are committed to providing a safe online and physical environment where our patrons and employees are treated with respe...
admission_text:
* [Home](/)
  * [Visit](/plan-visit)
  * Ticket Prices 

### Museum Admission

_Includes one**[Planetarium program](/plan-visit/theater-planetarium/now-showing-planetarium)**_  
[**Dome Theater**](/now-showing) films may be purchased separately.

**Adult 18-64:** $25  
**Teen 14-17:** $24  
**Senior 65+:** $21  
**Youth 4-13:** $19  
**Military/College:** $21  
**Members and children 3 and younger are always FREE.**

[Museum Admission](https://mpm.ticketapp.org/portal/product/90)  
[Museum Days (1/22-2/1)](https://mpm.ticketapp.org/portal/product/107)

_Members must[**register/sign in**](https://mpm.ticketapp.org/portal/auth) to receive benefits._

  * **The _Exploring Life on Earth_ and _Puelicher Butterfly Vivarium_ exhibits will close for the day at 4:30 p.m. on Wednesday, January 28 and Friday, January 30.**
  * **Milwaukee Public Museum's exhibit floors will be closed for the day on Saturday, February 21 and Saturday, May 16.**
  * The Third Floor Mezzanine (_Pre-Columbian America_) is **permanently closed** as part of the next phase of packing for our new museum. Take a virtual tour of the gallery **[here](https://mobileapps.mpm.edu/3dtours/precolumbian/)**.
  * Admission under ASTC, Educators, and Museums For All programs must be purchased in person with valid identification.
  * Our current hours of operation can be found [**here**](/plan-visit/hours).
  * Tickets can be reserved three weeks in advance (one week in advance for **[Kohl's Thank You Thursdays](/programs/...

collections_text:
## New year, new adventures!

Explore black holes, learn about mummies, cheers with Granny, and so much more at the Museum in 2026!

[Calendar of Events and Programs](/events-programs)

Scroll down

## Ancient Egypt comes to life!

Join us for our first Greatest Hit: Ancient Civilizations, January 10-February 14, as we celebrate MPM's iconic exhibit _Crossroads of Civilizations_ with special events, programs, and merchandise.

[Learn More](/greatest-hits/ancient-civilizations)

## Building the Future

Our new natural history museum, the Nature & Culture Museum of Wisconsin, will open in 2027 in downtown Milwaukee.

[Project Update](/future)

## Become a Member

MPM members enjoy FREE admission and exclusive access to special events.

[Learn More](/membership)

## Inspiring the Next Generation

From field trips to outreach, MPM offers unique experiences and resources for students and teachers at the Museum, in the community and in the classroom.

[School programs](/educators)

## Host an Event

The Museum is available to rent for weddings, holiday parties, and more!

[Start Planning](/plan-visit/plan-event)

## Exhibits

MPM has three and a half floors of immersive exhibits that take you back in time and around the world.

[Learn More](/plan-visit/exhibitions) [Virtual Tours](/programs/360-tours)

## Research & Collections

Find out more about the 4 million objects in our collection.

[View Collections](/research-collections)
